thread.title: Rice in Exceptional Form as Arsenal Star Displays High Confidence
thread.title_full: Rice in Exceptional Form as Arsenal Star Displays High Confidence

author: Zamin.uz
title: Rice in Exceptional Form as Arsenal Star Displays High Confidence
text:
Declan Rice, the midfielder for London’s Arsenal club, gave an interview following the Champions League match against Bayern Munich. The match ended in a 3–1 victory for Arsenal.
Although the 26-year-old English footballer did not score or provide an assist, he was named the best player of the match. "It wouldn't be an exaggeration to say I'm playing the best football of my career so far.
I feel incredibly confident in every training session and match. Perhaps I’ve never been in such form before.
I am very satisfied with my performance and hope this form continues for a long time," Rice said in a conversation with journalist Fabrizio Romano. Arsenal currently leads the group stage of the Champions League with 15 points, having not dropped a single point.
Read “Zamin” on Telegram!
